thread.title: Green vehicle technology on display
thread.title_full: Green vehicle technology on display | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Green vehicle technology on display
text:
Vehicles at last year's event Credit: ITV News Anglia More than than 2,500 delegates will be at the Millbrook Proving Ground in Bedford today for what is the biggest Low Carbon Vehicle event in the country.
It's the eighth year it's taken place and showcases new green technologies.
There will be a number of low carbon vehicles on site for visitors to take part in Ride & Drives. Also an address from Rt Hon Anna Soubry, Minister for Small Businesses, Industry & Enterprise.
Last updated Wed 9 Sep 2015 Technology Millbrook Bedfordshire
